useCase.name: Run Transaction Endpoint
useCase.trigger: User A triggers "Tx Polkadot Ledger" in API Client.

mainSequence.step: User A requests Transaction in API Client.
API Client forwards the request to API Server.
API Server invokes transact() on Polkadot Ledger Connector.
Polkadot Ledger responds to API Server.
API Server sends formatted response back to API Client.
